name: HookShotVR
description:
Let's fly around 3D space with fictional movement item "HookShot".

*** Note : Some in game texts are Japanese.
*** No need to worry about "How to Control", you can read it "Read Me" in English.
*** You need VR sets.
*** If you use "Index" Controller, please change bindings.

What you can do in this game.
  • You can fly around inside of map.
  • You can shoot a "Hook" wherever you want except out of map
  • You can challenge that how fast clear the stages.

What you should not expect this game
  • Stories
  • Beautiful Graphic

Game Modes
1. Time Attack Mode
Go through the arches in the order and compete for the time to finish all.
2. Break Time Attack Mode
Compete the time to destroy all objects on the stage.
3. Battle Mode
Compete the time to destroy all enemies(objects) on the stage.
